page.title: 14A Dundrennan Dairyman
page.content: My dad is a dairyman. He has an early start in the morning, getting up at 4 o'clock. He walks down to the farm with the dog and sets up the dairy and parlour before going out to the field to bring the cows in to be milked. Each cow has to have her udder washed before she is milked and while she is milking she gets dairy nuts to eat. Once she is finished she is let out into the cubicles where she can either lie down or go into the feeding passage to eat the silage.After the cows are all milked he lets them out to the field.He does the same at 3 o' clock in the afternoon.When he is not milking he helps calf the cows.
